name: packagejson-generator
readme:
generate package.json

#### Install `npm install -g packagejson-generator` #### Features * auto-generated keys * enviroment variables * auto create **scripts** keys if npm/script exists #### Usage ```shell usage: packagejson-generator.py ``` #### Example ```shell $ packagejson-generator.py # stdout { ... } $ packagejson-generator.py > package.json # write to file # export variables $ export URL="https://github.com/owner/repo/issues" $ packagejson-generator.py | grep url ``` [Examples/](https://github.com/russianidiot/packagejson-generator.py.cli/tree/master/Examples) Sources: * [scripts/packagejson-generator.py](https://github.com/russianidiot/packagejson-generator.py.cli/blob/master/bin/packagejson-generator.py) Feedback [![GitHub issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/russianidiot/packagejson-generator.py.cli.svg)](https://github.com/russianidiot/packagejson-generator.py.cli/issues) [![Join the chat at https://gitter.im/russianidiot/packagejson-generator.py.cli](https://badges.gitter.im/russianidiot/packagejson-generator.py.cli.svg)](https://gitter.im/russianidiot/packagejson-generator.py.cli) [![GitHub followers](https://img.shields.io/github/followers/russianidiot.svg?style=social&label=Follow)](https://github.com/russianidiot) * * *

cli packages russianidiot.github.io/cli/

repos list russianidiot.github.io
